WorkItem.Description:
I have still one Issue in virtualization-Mode, it can be reproduced in the VirtualizationSample

After loading the virtualized Items, Ctrl+Click the first Three Items, scroll Down and also Ctrl+Click the last three Items.
After scrolling back the selection ist lost. 

Also I cannot always select the TreeViewitem, if they are virtualized. (see Picture)

Is this an Issue or do I miss something? What is neccessary to achieve this?
WorkItem.Summary: SelectionLost in Virtualizing Mode after scrolling around
